code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant CLI as CLI Command
    participant Service as EventReindexingService
    participant OpenSearch as OpenSearch Cluster
    participant Bookmark as Bookmark API
    participant Metadata as RDM Records Index

    CLI->>Service: reindex_events(Infra_WorkerNode)
    Service->>Service: update_and_verify_templates(Infra_RedisCache)
    Service->>OpenSearch: Check/Update Templates

    loop For Each Event Type
        Service->>OpenSearch: get_monthly_indices(Infra_WorkerNode)
        OpenSearch-->>Service: List of monthly indices

        loop For Each Monthly Index
            Service->>Service: migrate_monthly_index(Infra_RedisCache)
            Service->>OpenSearch: create_enriched_index(Infra_IngressController)
            OpenSearch-->>Service: New index name

            Service->>Bookmark: get_bookmark(Infra_RedisCache)
            Bookmark-->>Service: Last processed ID

            loop Batch Processing
                Service->>Service: check_health_conditions(Infra_RedisCache)
                Service->>OpenSearch: process_monthly_index_batch(Infra_EtcdCluster)
                Service->>Metadata: get_metadata_for_records(Infra_RedisCache)
                Metadata-->>Service: Record metadata
                Service->>Service: enrich_events(Infra_WorkerNode)
                Service->>OpenSearch: bulk_index(Infra_WorkerNode)
                Service->>Bookmark: set_bookmark(Infra_EtcdCluster)
            end

            Service->>Service: validate_enriched_data(Infra_WorkerNode)
            Service->>OpenSearch: update_aliases(Infra_IngressController)

            alt Current Month Index
                Service->>OpenSearch: setup_write_alias(Infra_WorkerNode)
                Service->>OpenSearch: migrate_new_records(Infra_RedisCache)
            end

            Service->>OpenSearch: delete_old_index(Infra_EtcdCluster)
        end
    end

    Service-->>CLI: Migration results
repo_description: A usage statistics dashboard for InvenioRDM instances
